subtasks: Herding goats from a large pen into smaller pens
Sorting nannies (female goats) from kids (baby goats)
Administering vaccinations to goats, including clostridial peripherens (C and D) and sore mouth vaccine
Applying ear tags to differentiate male and female goats (left ear for females, right ear for males)
Examining goats' feet and deworming if necessary

tasks.task: Managing multi-species grazing with goats and bison
subtasks: Discussing the benefits of mixing goat grazing with bison/cattle for land management
Observing goats' impact on unwanted vegetation (e.g., cedars, brush) compared to bison's effects
Identifying areas for future mechanical intervention to enhance grass growth
Considering the role of historical ungulates in land management and current approaches with goats and bison

tasks.task: Fencing and edge management in goat pastures
subtasks: Evaluating goat fencing effectiveness and natural browsing behavior
Analyzing the impact of goat browsing on tree regeneration and wildlife habitat
Assessing the need for supplemental fencing to prevent escapes and manage goat movements
Discussing the role of predator-proof fencing and natural barriers in goat ranching
Evaluating coyote-proof fencing techniques and goat survival strategies
Considering the importance of maintaining diverse wildlife habitats within goat pastures
